doc:
Madge Blake https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madge_Blake 0 Madge Blake (née Cummings; May 31, 1899 – February 19, 1969) was an American character actress best remembered for her roles as Larry Mondello's mother, Margaret Mondello, on the CBS/ABC sitcom Leave it to Beaver, as Flora MacMichael on the ABC/CBS sitcom The Real McCoys, and as Aunt Harriet Cooper in 96 episodes of ABC's Batman. Gene Kelly had a special affection for her and included her in each of his films following her role in An American in Paris. Madge_Blake ( née_Cummings ; May_31_,_1899 – February_19_,_1969 ) was an_American_character_actress_best remembered for her_roles as Larry_Mondello 's_mother , Margaret_Mondello , on the_CBS/ABC_sitcom Leave it to Beaver , as Flora_MacMichael on the_ABC/CBS_sitcom The_Real_McCoys , and as Aunt_Harriet_Cooper in 96_episodes of ABC 's_Batman . Gene_Kelly had a_special_affection for her and included her in each of his_films following her_role in An_American in Paris .
